memories
“Nothing is ever really
lost to us as long as
we remember it.”

Tears, idle tears, I know not what they mean,
Tears from the depths of some devine despair
Rise in the heart, and gather to the eyes,
In looking on the happy autumn fields,
And thinking of the days that are no more.”
Alfred Lord Tennyson

Voice of the Good Worker... “There comes a time in December 2022, Volume 2, Issue 6
samgn your life when you have
to choose to turn the page,
write another book or
simply close it.”
The News Letter of Our Lady of Rogate Ashram, Aluva

“What i like about
photographs is
that they capture
a moment
that’s gone forever,
impossible to reproduce.”

“There are
memories
that time does
not erase...
Forever does
not make
loss forgettable,
only bearable.”

“Never blame anyone in your life.
Good people give you happiness.
Bad people give you experience.
Worst people give you a lesson.
And best people give you memories.”

“A million feelings.
A thousand thoughts.
A hundred memories.
All for one person.”

“Good bye may
seem forever.
Farewell is like the end,
but in my heart
is the memory
and there you will
always be.”

“Childhood memories
are sometimes
covered and obscured beneath
the things that come later,
like childhood toys forgotten
at the bottom of a crammed
adult closet, but they are
never lost for good.”
All the best
